data.actual_result: You see the green circle around their avatar indicating they are transmitting
data.expected_result: You should be unable to see the green circle around their avatar indicating they are transmitting
data.short_description: You can see others transmitting voice when you are deafened
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel with at least one other user - Deafen yourself - Tell the other user to transmit over voice
